attributes.review: I just started trying out the app and it failed horribly. It was like the 60s all over again. The sites took forever and there were hundreds of ads. There was so much propaganda that I questioned if china was controlling this. Would not recommend because it will literally burn your neurons.🌝
attributes.title: Worse App Ever

attributes.review: I thought that by downloading this app I was able to help vote the Orange himself back into office but this app takes forever to download and when it finally did, I had to put MY NUMBER IN! WHAT KIND OF DEMOCRACY IS THIS?!?! anyway, I hope he doesn’t get re-elected because that would be a sure shame ✨💕

attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded the app my apps were starting to get hacked & my email is blowing up from people getting into my email 😡😡 it made my phone glitch so I had to buy a new phone!!😔 OBAMA 2020!! attributes.review: I downloaded this app and then bam! COOCKIES just so many viruses. I lost everything I had. All of my photos my work emails. I got fired from my job because of it. Thanks so much to this app for being a pain in the 🤬this app has to go it is horrible for our children. It might also be fatal. PROTECT OUR CHILDREN FROM THIS DESPICABLE EXCUSE OF AN APP!!!!!!!🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬
attributes.title: This app ruined EVERYTHING

attributes.review: I got the app for the lolz but only to find out that it KILLED MY PET ROCK!!! The audacity of this pure trash to kill Harold the third made the anger in me boil to the point where I was willing to smite any trump supporters in sight. My poor cat also saw that I downloaded this app and then continued to have the worst diarrhea on my brand new white carpet! The color orange also gives me migraines
attributes.title: Pure trash app

attributes.review: This is one of the worst apps I have ever gotten. This orange man popped up on my screen and called me the n-word. Not only that but it took YEARS to download. Like what type of app takes that long. Shortly after I downloaded the app my phone software completely broke. Worst app ever, it’s filled with racist boomers screaming Trump 2020. Send help. 0/10.
attributes.title: Horrible App

attributes.review: This app took 5 hours to download, as I may add the app lags, it constantly logs me out, the app doesn’t work properly, all I want to do is learn about MY president and I can’t even do that without having for log in several times. I’m so sick and tired of this app, it’s gone to the point where I have to write a bad review. ✨
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD I REPEAT DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: This is the worst app it gave my phone 5 different bugs and it was also really expensive to fix’s it the worst part is that my dog almost died cus when I opened it it started to play this really annoying song about a orange worst experience of my life
attributes.title: How this app owned by a orange almost kill my dog and phone
